name: Eclipse
summary:
﻿"His partner told him to shoot the criminal, so he picked up the gun and took a shot... ...even though that event has passed, the echo of a gunshot still resounds in his mind."

After having a bad dream of a hostage incident, Officer Kelvin Bishop awakens to a dark morning. The past still haunts him, but even so he has to get ready for work like every other day.
At the same time, but in a different place. Andrea Frost, an ordinary high school girl brings her friend to the hospital with her sister.

Suddenly there is an eclipse, and everything starts to go wrong. While she is struggling to get back home, Kelvin is struggling to get to the police station. A grieving man and an innocent girl are now trapped in the same situation.

Can this be just coincidence,
or is something more...? Something extraordinary.
